entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Periods of snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
